short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Having a hard time scrolling to the top of the page. This is the extension for you! Collapse arrow icon by Icons8

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple extension to assist in scrolling to the top of the page.

Click the icon and watch it go!

This extension can't gather your data. It does not have the code to do that.

Collapse arrow icon by Icons8 (https://icons8.com/icon/86194/collapse-arrow)
